Voice.Join: Join the VC you are currently in.

Bot.Help: It would be kinda weird to explain what the help command is... You're using it
Bot.Suggestion: Allows you to suggest a feature or report a bug directly to the developer (Joery).

User.Nick: Allows you to set your nickname.
User.Role: Allows youto use `role color` to change the color of your role and `role name` to change the name.

Misc.Meme: Get a random meme from the [instant regret playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLv3TTBr1W_9u3TaDTrZyW-7UsJQCQzqmP) (2 and 3) totaling 9577 videos
Misc.Math: Let me calculate a math equation for you. Usage: `math 12*13` or `math sqrt(4761)`
Misc.Dictionary: Search a word in the higly accurate Urban Dictionary.
